mapper.insert: insert into grouby_rank values (#{spotId}, #{regId}, #{rankCompId}, #{rankScore}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp())
mapper.select: select grank.spot_id spot_id, grank.reg_id reg_id, grank.rank_comp_id rank_comp_id, grank.rank_score rank_score, grank.reg_date reg_date, grank.mod_date mod_date, rankcomp.rank_comp_name from grouby_rank grank, grouby_rank_comp rankcomp where grank.spot_id = #{value} and grank.rank_comp_id = rankcomp.rank_comp_id

select grank.spot_id, grank.rank_comp_id, truncate(sum(grank.rank_score) / count(*), 1) rank_score, (select rankComp.rank_comp_name from grouby_rank_comp rankComp where rankComp.rank_comp_id = grank.rank_comp_id) rankCompName from grouby_rank grank where grank.rank_comp_id in (select spotRank.rank_comp_id from grouby_spot_rank spotRank where spotRank.spot_id = #{value}) and grank.spot_id = #{value} group by grank.rank_comp_id

select #{value} spot_id, rankComp.rank_comp_id, 0 rank_score, rankComp.rank_comp_name from grouby_rank_comp rankComp where rankComp.rank_comp_id in (select spotRank.rank_comp_id from grouby_spot_rank spotRank where spotRank.spot_id = #{value})
